title: QualityRunEvidence
description: Schema for quality evidence entries recorded in smoke-results.json and governance dashboards.

render_id.description: Unique identifier for the render/sample where this evidence was produced.

suite_profile.description: Quality profile used when generating evidence.

tool_name.description: Tool that produced this evidence record.

duration_seconds.description: Total runtime of the tool in seconds.

artifact_uri.description: GitHub Actions artifact URL for logs or coverage output.

recorded_at.description: Timestamp when the evidence was recorded.

retention_expires_at.description: Timestamp when the artifact expires; must be at least 90 days after recorded_at.

ci_run_id.description: Identifier for the GitHub Actions run that produced the artifact.

log_path.description: Repository-relative path where the log is stored locally (e.g., .riso/quality/ruff.log).

notes.description: Optional additional context for triage or remediation.
